column3: “This one is great  very happy talkative effects defiantly one of my top 5”

“Have had this from sannies seeds by Escobar thought it had romulan in it as well sure tasted like it. 4 stars and 5 stars on Escobars Boudica (Exodus cheese x Romulan x C-99 x Santa Maria) it gets the 5 star vote from me. Chucks bride I messed up and plucked it a week or so early and it was still a good smoke so it coulda been stronger if I didn't jump the gun. Good tasting dank weed is all u need”
